plot outline: Manohar and Nayana are college sweethearts who fall in love and elope. Nayana's father however, is not pleased with this and decides to get his daughter back by hook or crook. Manohar and Nayana face a series of challenges that they must overcome together.
title: Supplementary
plot: A man is driven to the point of committing suicide after his girlfriend dies after she is bitten by a snake. It takes a couple of more hard-hitting lessons before he learns the true value of life.

Manohar and Nayana are college sweethearts who fall in love and elope. Nayana's father however, is not pleased with this and decides to get his daughter back by hook or crook. Manohar and Nayana face a series of challenges that they must overcome together.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
